item.title: Survival Analysis
item.description: Survival analysis ğŸ”—Survival analysis is a captivating and practical field that has always captivated my interest. This specialized area of statistics deals with analyzing the time until an event of interest occurs. Whether applied in medical research, engineering, economics, or social sciences, survival analysis allows us to delve into the dynamics of events that are not instantaneous and are influenced by a multitude of factors. One of the most intriguing aspects of survival analysis is its ability to handle censored data.

item.title: æ¸¸æ³³èª²æµæ°´å¸³ Learning swimming in summer
item.description: My experience of learning swimming in 2023 summer.

item.title: Dancing Among the Clouds: My Aerial Dance Adventure in Taipei
item.description: My exhilarating hobby of aerial dance in Taipei fuels my passion for defying gravity and expressing myself through graceful movements on silks and hoops. Amidst challenges, I find strength, artistry, and a supportive community, balancing my academic pursuits with the soaring freedom of dance.

item.title: The Art of Seal Carving: A Journey into Ancient Elegance
item.description: Seal carving, an ancient art form blending creativity and mindfulness, captivates a student’s heart. Through intricate designs on stone and wood, this practice preserves tradition and celebrates individuality. An oasis of tranquility, seal carving fosters mental well-being and community, inviting all to explore its timeless allure.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
